title: Modern 3BHK Apartment in Vesu
description: A spacious and modern fully-furnished 3BHK apartment located in the heart of Vesu. Comes with all modern amenities and a beautiful city view from the balcony. Ideal for families.

title: Cozy 2BHK Flat in Adajan
description: A cozy and well-ventilated 2BHK flat in a peaceful society in Adajan. Perfect for small families or working professionals. Close to markets, schools, and hospitals.

title: Luxurious Villa with Private Pool
description: An exclusive and luxurious 5BHK villa with a private swimming pool and garden. Located in a premium gated community, offering ultimate privacy and a high-end lifestyle.
